front.title: IXFR-ONLY to Prevent IXFR Fallback to AXFR

abstract.t: This documents proposes a new QTYPE (Query pseudo RRtype) for theDomain Name System (DNS). IXFR-ONLY is a variant of IXFR (RFC 1995)that allows an authoritative server to incrementally update zonecontent from another (primary) server without falling back from IXFRto AXFR. This way, alternate peers can be contacted more quickly andconvergence of zone content may be achieved much faster in important,resilient operational scenarios.
